attributes.action: dissolve parliament and call an immediate general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are now in completely uncharted political territory - calls for the resignation of the speaker, investigations into illegal expenses and the daily release of more improper behaviour by MP's.  Now is the time for the UK public to re-assert their right to proper representation.  All MP's must stand for re-election on their merit. NOW!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
